short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort your tabs and show them as a tree.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your browser was a mess. You had too many tabs. Now, click a button, and view your tabs sorted, grouped, as a tree. Find what you need easier. Close what you don't need in batch. It's simple, and you'll be surprised how much it helps.
